## TreeNode.mapAsync() method

Iterates over a node's children and returns a new root node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mapAsync<U>(callback: (node: TreeNode<T>, parent: TreeNode<U> | undefined) => Promise<U>, parent?: TreeNode<U>): Promise<TreeNode<U>>;
```
